actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A concurrent resolution relating to withdrawing the new guidelines proposed by the Secretary of Labor with respect to the health and safety training of miners.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the new Department of Labor health and safety training regulations for miners places an undue burden on small store, sand, and gravel surface mining operations and should not apply to operations with 35 or fewer employees.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution relating to withdrawing the new guidelines proposed by the Secretary of Labor with respect to the health and safety training of miners.
